page.title: 12EVENTS 2 BISHOP THORNTON
page.content: Here are the words for one of the songs the children made up for the Medieval Masque. In the year of 1460 long ago Bishop Thornton was a lonely place Four times a year just to please the king, People walked 8 miles to church for holy days, They would rather stay at home and dig thier fields, Time was scarce and crops must be tilled,Starve they must if they don't make a store, Winters long and cold and does not pity them. Forester Wallworth made a pledge to build a church, Bridle paths from every side will meet. Sorry to say more taxes you will pay, In a village of thorns a church was born so long ago. There was great rejoicing when the church was finished every stone, John and Margaret met and fell in love, Permission was sought for the wedding to take place.............
